activeJobs.description: We are seeking a highly motivated and consultative Custom Software Sales Representative to join our team. This role involves working closely with businesses to understand their unique challenges and proposing tailored software solutions developed by our team. The ideal candidate will have strong communication skills, a consultative sales approach, and the ability to bridge the gap between client requirements and technical possibilities.
